reviews.text: Really nice spot for a quick lunch in the neighborhood. Everything was pretty quick and tasted really good. The wagyu burger is really big and delicious. My server James, was really friendly and top of everything. Im in the area once a week for work and I think I found my new spot. Neighborhood gem for sure.

Great, lively atmosphere! The food was delicious, particularly the pastrami flatbread and chicken schnitzel sandwich.

The prime rib hummus was also a standout while the crispy artichokes were okay. Our server was a little standoffish and not helpful when we asked for recommendations but we managed.

My one tip to the restaurant ‚Äì ‚Äì please add handles to your to go bags.

GIL IS THE BEST SERVER EVER!!!!! He is so funny and personable and most importantly, made sure you enjoy your experience. The food was absolutely phenomenal and he paced it out perfectly. There was not one item I didn‚Äôt like! Atmosphere is great and lively. I definitely recommend coming back here. This was my first time, but my mom has been over five already lol.
Bianca was an excellent server and the food was top notch!! Recommended
Food was amazing! Service was amazing! Bianca gave great recommendations!
Great time! Good service. Fresh food. Epic.
James was amazing
This place is amazing. Great atmosphere, food is incredible. James ROCKS BTW!!
Emily is awesome
James was terrific.  Helped us pick out appetizers.  Wonderful meal.
Emily was very attentive and professional. The food was delicious too!!!
The food was absolutely delicious ‚Äî every dish was fresh &  flavorful. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and the service was outstanding - Emily was very kind and professional.
Emily is the best

I was really excited to finally try Motek in NYC after falling in love with their Miami location. It‚Äôs absolutely worth the hype and the hard to get reservation.

First of all, the restaurant is so nice. It‚Äôs spacious, beautifully designed, has warm lighting, vibrant energy and buzzing with people.

The service was just as impressive. Every staff member was attentive and kind, and I have to give a special shoutout to the manager, Ronald. True five-star service is rare these days and he made us feel genuinely welcome.

Now the food - absolutely delicious! My favorites were the lamb kebab and the classic hummus with laffa, soft, warm, and perfect. The added tahini and s‚Äôchug was üòòEvery dish was fresh, full of flavor and beautifully presented. And the dessert was amazing!

I already made reservations for December! If I could give more than five stars, I would.
Wonderful restaurant. Wonderful service. Incredible food.

What a joy to have Motek restaurant in NY.
The food the service and our waitress Bora were excellent.
Amazing experience if you come ask for bora

The experience was amazing! It was my first time at the restaurant, and I‚Äôm truly impressed. The food was very good, but the best part was the attention and service from Adam Ongel ‚Äî he‚Äôs an excellent employee! üëè
The food was delicious, and Adam Ongel service made us feel very comfortable. He explained the menu really well since we weren‚Äôt familiar with it, and everything he recommended was excellent.

A Miami gem in Flatiron district. Motek delivers the same high quality service, superb food and fantastic atmosphere in this New York restaurant. They were able to bring the Miami vibe into the heart of NYC. Their food is delicious, exciting, fresh and delightful. Their service makes you feel like a superstar and the bright decor and ambiance make this whole experience top notch. Highly recommend!
Ongel was an amazing server here. Very polite and kind and gave great recommendations. Restaurant has fantastic food with great ambiance. Will be back
The cocktails were amazing. Best dirty martini ever! Zucchini pancake snd schnitzel sandwich! Love sitting at the bar! Bartender charming! Fabulous evening thank you!
Great service, delish food and great ambiance.

What a GORGEOUS new addition to our city. The food was excellent, such a warm and inviting ambiance. The handsome bartender, Kevin, was one of the best I‚Äôve ever met. So sweet, kind, and personable. I absolutely loved chatting with him. Can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!
Our waiter, Adam Ongel, was very sweet, attentive, cute and helpful!

Motek never disappoints. We come here often, and every visit somehow feels better than the last. Our server, Adam Ongel, was beyond amazing‚Äîattentive, friendly, and genuinely made us feel welcome.

We ordered the chicken sandwich, Italy pita bread, and babaganoush, and each bite was perfection. The chicken sandwich, in particular, was hands down the freshest and most delicious sandwich we‚Äôve ever had‚Äîflavorful, juicy, and crafted with such care and quality. The pita was soft and warm, and the babaganoush had that perfect smoky richness.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place that delivers consistent excellence, Motek is it. Highly recommend!
The food was absolutely amazing and James our server was terrific! James checked in on us, made sure our water glasses were filled too. Some of the best Israeli food I have had in a long time!
Incredible!! Food was great the server james best vibes!!
Jimmy was a grear waitor
Ezekiel was fantastic! Great food and place.
James #1 guy, amazing everything.
So happy that this Miami staple is finally in NYC! Our server Bora was amazing, he gave us great recommendations and was super kind! Took great care of us. Looking forward to coming back soon
Great place.  Great food. Bora server was amazing
Beautiful place, delicious food, and great service. Can't wait to go back!

Food,service and atmosphere was great. Thanks to Kevin Restrepo for being a lovely host and making our impromptu anniversary brunch a success. Thank you Kevin for the kindness and suggestions. The bread pudding was amazing. All of the food was so good.
Kevin Restrepo was amazing! Service was amazing and very friendly. Would definitely come back just because of him!
Ongel was very friendly and very helpful. Great labneh and pita!!
Best place!
An amazing experience with Andrike! He gave us great tips. Food was great, but came out slowly but was worth the wait!!
Service was great thank you Emily!
Great service from Ongel and food is amazing
Food was amazing! Ongel is the best- great service!
Our waitress Emily was fantastic!
Managed to walk in as a party of two on a Saturday night. The food was great, especially the zucchini cakes. Emily was very attentive.
Motek was incredible, the food was amazing as was the atmosphere. Ongel was our server and he was absolutely fantastic. Highly recommended.
Ongel my waiter was the best highly recommended to see him when you go
The food was exceptional! Liked the hummus with shug, hallumi skewers, perfect babaganush, and tasty snitzel. Ongel was super friendly and helped make the experience great!
Ezequel was amazing. The food is unmatched. The service is great! It was 10 of us so we got to try many dishes and drinks. Everything was amazing
Best food and service

Beautiful restaurant with amazing vibes and top notch service by our server Emily! She went above and beyond for us and had great recommendations along with great vibes and always had a smile on her face which we love to see. We will definitely be back and we highly recommend this spot you won‚Äôt regret it. Thank you to Emily!
Ongel was a great waiter! Very friendly and helpful walking us through the menu

For starters, every single item between all of us was delicious. From starters to desserts. An wonderful place to dine.

Food: Mediterranean flavor with an Israeli twist an a high class spin. Delicious flavorful and fresh. Every dish was delicious. Often a plate has a good dish here or there but this place the entire menu is delectable.

Service: Excellent well mannered service. From the moment we walked in and were shown our table every server smiled at us politely. Dishes were fresh yet every single dish we ordered came quickly despite the full crowd

Ambiance: Mediterranean Greek vibe. Well decorated. Simple and classy. Comfortable seating and cozy. It does get crowded and a little noisy but not to a bothersome level.

Expect to pay about 100 per person but very well worth it. All across the bird from food to service this place excels in. Come here and expect to be wowed.

We stopped by without a reservation and the place was absolutely packed. At first, we were told we could wait for the first-come-first-serve bar seating, but to our surprise, the staff found us a table as soon as one opened up. Everyone was so kind and efficient ‚Äî really impressive given how busy it was.
The food was amazing ‚Äî simple, fresh, and full of flavor. Their plain pita bread was incredible, the salad was super fresh, and the hummus with beef was an unexpected highlight. Turkish oven pita with ground beef is a must-try. You get a little pair of scissors to cut through it! I regret not ordering it myself, but I did steal a bite and it was easily one of the best things we had.
The only thing I didn‚Äôt love was the spicy margarita ‚Äî a bit too syrupy for me. We skipped dessert since we were already full and nothing from the ice-cream-based options really stood out.
Overall, though, the experience was wonderful ‚Äî great food, lovely service, and a buzzing atmosphere. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

Perfect and delicious!
Food was great, tasty and good portions, price/quality was good!
Beautiful place, very loud, music plays in the background, and the modern decor doesn‚Äôt absorb much of the noise.
Service was great and quick!
Totally recommend going, will be in my restaurant rotation

The restaurant itself is absolutely gorgeous! Service was attentive and very friendly. James, our server, knew what everything was and explained the menu well. The hummus and laffa was perfection. Fluffy bread and creamy smooth hummus with amazing tahini and olive oil. Spicy and delicious schug on top was perfect! The chicken schnitzel plate was also perfect. Crispy, thin, and light chicken served with a simple, but wonderful side salad with various types of fresh greens. I would love to come back and try more!

Our server Bora gave us excellent recommendations for our first time here. Hummus came with pita bread, the greek salad was flavorful and beautifully presented. Salmon skewers cooked well as we asked, and the cauliflower was to die for. Dessert was baklava and the vanilla bean havila dish both also superb. Hope they keep up the good work can‚Äôt wait to come back! Excellent atmosphere too!

Motek is absolutely phenomenal! The customer service here is top-notch ‚Äî every single time I‚Äôve visited, the staff has been so kind and attentive. The managers in particular are incredibly friendly and always go above and beyond to make you feel welcome. Even with last-minute reservations, they always do their best to accommodate, which I truly appreciate.

And the food? 10/10, without a doubt. Everything is fresh, flavorful, and beautifully prepared. Motek has quickly become one of my favorite spots in Manhattan ‚Äî highly recommend!

I‚Äôve went to Motek 3 weeks in a row since it opened and it keeps on getting better and better! It tastes just like the locations in Miami. The service is impeccable, the manager Marco is amazing and so caring and attentive! The staff are so warm and friendly and aim to please! The food is even better!! Everything is so delicious and authentic and full of flavor! The hummus is the best in NYC, the kebabs are perfection, the salads are so flavorful and the deserts are incredible. All around A++++ go here, you won‚Äôt be disappointed!!

Absolutely loved Motek!
Everything from the food to the atmosphere was outstanding. The flavors were fresh, vibrant, and beautifully balanced ‚Äî you can really taste the quality in every bite. The service was warm and attentive without being overbearing, and the whole vibe of the place feels lively yet comfortable. Perfect spot for brunch, lunch, or dinner. Definitely one of my favorite Mediterranean restaurants in NYC ‚Äî can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Can I give Motek more than 5 stars?? Just as good as their Miami locations!! Everything was incredible. My suggestion is order a bunch of plates and do family style cause you're going to want everything on the menu. My favorites were the mushroom hummus and the haloumi cheese on skewers with a glaze that was out of this world!!! Also the staff was attentive and truly cared about our dining experience. Feels like the real deal and I'm so happy Motek is here in NYC. Welcome to the neighborhood we needed you :) Hope to bring all my friends back soon (and you should too)!

Friendly staff. Cool rhythmic dance music playing. Bar seating was easy and wait for table didn‚Äôt appear to last long. I had the mushroom hummus with house made l‚Äôaffa bread appetizer . Super yummy. Wish I was hungrier cause the food looked delicious. Not cheap, but hey, it‚Äôs NYC.

Good food, Location, Ambience. The Watermelon cooler was delicious. Had the mushroom hummus and it came with a gluten free wrap which was so tasty! That was the best part that they offered an alternative to their pita. Entree was the chicken kebab and fries...decent kebab, a little bland but fries with a side of garlic aoili were delicious

Really blown away by the quality of the food. Had the eggplant hummus, za‚Äôatar labneh, Turkish pita and Greek salad. Would highly recommend all of these. The depth of flavor in the labneh was really surprising. The hummus was outstanding, I really couldn‚Äôt believe how much it stood out from others I‚Äôve had.

Service was superp- very friendly and fun.

Atmosphere was beautiful. Staff was welcoming. Food and drinks were amazing. Everything we ate was to die for. The mushroom hummus, the butchers cut steak were one of my favorite things I ate. They are able to cater to allergies and the staff are knowledgeable and able to to make recommendations. Will definitely be coming back.

I am so happy to have a piece of home in NYC! I love Motek so so much, I was so happy to come to the new Flatiron location to try my favorite plates from Miami here and it didn‚Äôt disappoint! Will definitely be coming back! Everything was absolutely delicious! Janeth was our waitress and she was very attentive!

Our experience at Motek was excellent: a combination of delicious, fresh food, a pleasant atmosphere, and exceptional service.
Cristian was our server and made us feel right at home.
The managers also came by to ask how everything was and were attentive to any concerns.
We are grateful to the Motek NYC team and wish them all the best in this new beginning.

Wonderful addition to the New York restaurant scene.
The space is beautiful and service was fantastic.
The menu has a great variety of wines, cocktails and Mediterranean options and some unique twists.
We shared a delicious variety of starters, hummus and pita, zucchini cakes, and the Moroccan cigars.
For mains, the crispy chicken schnitzel and ribeye baguette were fantastic, highly recommend if you love a good sandwich.
One of the few times I‚Äôve had to take food home because of the generous portions.
Will definitely be back.
Food is fresh and delicious, drinks are amazing.  Wine selection is great. Staff is incredibly friendly. We enjoyed it def coming back

Had a great time at Motek. Cocktails were refreshing and well balanced, we loved the watermelon tequila. Food was tasty and a variety of options to choose from. Our favorites were the hummus with beef, the salmon ceviche and the wagyu burger. We even had our own little ketchup bottle. However, what made our night was our sever Gabriela. She made sure that we had a great time by giving us recommendations and making us laugh all night. Will definitely be coming back to Motek üß°üß°
The place looks nice but the food is poor. I found what I'm pretty sure was hair on my chicken kebab. If you care about sanitary food don't eat here.
One of the best meals I have had in my life. The food. The service. The atmosphere. Great for families and big parties. Great for lunch and dinner.

Absolutely phenomenal experience from start to finish! Motek's food is pure perfection, with every dish showcasing fresh, high-quality ingredients and stunning presentation. The warm and inviting ambiance sets the tone for an unforgettable meal, and the attentive staff are dedicated to making every moment exceptional. A must-visit for anyone seeking outstanding cuisine and service ‚Äì we'll be back!

Nous avons √©t√© servie par Chango qui a √©t√© souriant, de bon conseils et tr√®s serviable !!
Le lieu est tr√®s sympas
En ce qui concerne la nourriture, les plats sont bien garnis ce qui est le concept du restaurant sous le signe du partage, √† mon sens il manquait juste un poil de saveur au niveau du poulet shawarma

Dined at Motek‚Äôs NYC location this past week with my kids and was so happy to see it‚Äôs just as great as the Aventura location! The food was fresh and delicious, and the service was excellent. The manager, Guisseppi, was incredibly accommodating and made sure our experience was perfect. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

Walked in and sat at the bar.  The bartender Kevin made me their old fashioned cocktail and was very nice and helpful during my meal.  The atmosphere is a mix of homey/comforting/ sexy.  The music is appropriate and not loud. The food is delicious. 5 stars üåü

Our waitress Unique gave us the most fantastic service and we even got a little sweet treat to round out our meal
I‚Äôve been a New Yorker, my whole life and usually when restaurants open for the first time there‚Äôs usually an adjustment period but this place hits it out of the park right out of the gate!!!
Best restaurant in new york‚Ä¶best food best service super fast service the server esquie was amazing..great experience start to finish.

I had an amazing experience at the new Motek in Flatiron! Everything was absolutely perfect ‚Äî the food was incredible, full of flavor and beautifully presented. The service was outstanding, friendly and attentive from start to finish. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the prices are more than fair for the quality you get.

I can‚Äôt recommend this place enough ‚Äî everyone needs to go and enjoy this Mediterranean cuisine. Motek has definitely become one of my new favorite spots in the city!

Amazing Mediterranean flavors and super friendly service. The ambiance is fun and classy, definitely instagram worthy. Out waiter Tasha was very helpful and made us feel very welcomed. My favorite was tuna tartar and watermelon/ feta salad. Also zataar fries definitely are worth coming back. Babaganush comes with a freshly baked bread, heavenly.
We got lucky to walk in on the opening day for brunch and definitely want to come back for dinner. Variety of seating options including tables, booths, two bar counters, a separate seating area downstairs plus a few tables outside.

Iba siempre al de Miami aventura y al mudarme a NY lo extra√±aba.. pero por fin ahora ya est√°n ac√°!! Excelente todo como siempre!! üíØ % recomendable.
El manager (Italiano) una persona maravillosa. Nos hizo sentir como en casa. Motek como siempre te robaste ‚ù§Ô∏è
Beautiful spot, and the food was even better. Creg set us up at the bar and the service was unmatched. We ordered one of everything; all amazing. Definitely recommend!!!

Had the pleasure to enjoy the spicy feta, and the Moroccan cigars are to die for, meaty and spicy with a tahini dip sauce so good, the hanger stale with the citrus fries are really good. All this food was order as my server Tasha recommended all the dishes and they were on point !!! Thank you !

I‚Äôve been to Motek several times and it never disappoints! The food always tastes homemade and full of flavor. I love trying something new every time I visit. The bartenders are amazing- especially Creg, who always helps choose the perfect cocktail. He really knows how to match your mood and remembers the preferences of regulars!

The ambiance alone transported me to a tropical escape I long for in the concrete jungle. As someone with astigmatism I appreciate the brighter lighter that‚Äôs often opposite of NYC dining experience. Service was attentive despite how busy it was. Must get the mushroom hummus and brazino, you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
The food is amazing, great for any type of eater: healthy, hearty, vegetarian, and also gluten free. Great service, too. Glad they mace to NYC after many meals at their Miami location

We had such a wonderful experience thanks to our server, Adam, who truly went above and beyond to make our lunch special. From the moment we were seated, Adam greeted us with a warm smile and genuine enthusiasm. He was incredibly attentive, making thoughtful recommendations that turned out to be spot-on ‚Äî especially the crispy chicken schnitzel sandwich!

The food was excellent, but Adam‚Äôs hospitality was what made our time truly memorable. We‚Äôll definitely be back ‚Äî and will be asking for Adam again!
Lively, buzzing and big menu. Laffa pita was phenomenal and fresh. Will be back. I‚Äôd give it five stars but I could tell they were still working out some service kinks to be expected with new spots
Fabulous food, vibe and service. Both the hostess, our server Bianca and the manager Giuseppe were fantastic.
Fun brunch spot! With delicious Mediterranean food! Clearly marked vegan, vegetarian and gluten free options. We‚Äôll definitely be back for more in the near future:)

Motek is an absolute gem and going to be a new staple of Israeli cuisine in Manhattan! The vibe is very Miami/Tel Aviv with lively music and trendy decor. The staff are extremely professional and kind. But the best part- the food! Every dish we had was a hit. Also something really cool- on the status of if they are kosher or not- all of the meat is Glatt Kosher and prepared separately from the dairy, so even though the restaurant itself is not certified kosher, if you keep kosher and are okay with that it‚Äôs an amazing option for kosher meat!!!

We had many dishes but I want to highlight two. We got the steak which was prepared perfectly- I highly suggest! And for dessert we had the halva black sesame ice cream. I‚Äôve eaten at a lot of places in the city and this dish was absolutely unique. I have never had something quite like how they prepared it. Highly suggest that too!

You won‚Äôt regret going to Motek!
We sat at the bar and had a great time! The drinks were amazing by Kevin. R. The best bartender!
Great addition to the city. Our bartender was was very charming, his name was creg. The chicken kebab was amazing, definitely a must try
What a great Mediterranean restaurant. Food was great. Service was excellent. And the space is amazing.
Restrepo was great - super friendly and attentive. The food and overall vibe were amazing, definitely a place we‚Äôd come back to!

Had a great dinner here with my daughter. The food was excellent, we had the hummus, pastrami flatbread, lamb chops and lamb shank. The service was excellent and very friendly from the hostess that greeted us to are server. 10/10. We look forward to going back and trying more items on the menu.

Motek Flatiron in NYC is a lovely spot with a really pretty ambiance that sets the perfect mood for a relaxed meal. The staff is quick, attentive, and genuinely sweet, making the experience even more enjoyable. The food is also good ‚Äî flavorful and satisfying without being over the top. Great place for a casual yet charming dining outing!

Motek NYC is outstanding. The food is amazing‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and consistent every time. The staff is fantastic and treats you like family. I had a last-minute reservation cancellation due to a family emergency, and they went above and beyond to accommodate without hesitation. That level of care says everything about their service.

This is my new favorite go-to spot in the city with the best vibes. Big shoutout to Claudia, Destiny, and Giuseppe for making every visit special.

Finally!!! Motek has arrived to NYC! Excellent food and serice, one of the best in town. No wonder they are so packed. Don‚Äôt go there - run!! A special thanks to Ezequiel for providing such amazing service. Can‚Äôt wait to come again ‚ù§Ô∏è
Had a great experience. The team is really helpful and there are many of them so you get anything you want very quickly. The food was excellent.

Wow, spectacular! I was truly amazed and very happy with the quality of service and food. Everything was excellent and delicious. The atmosphere was great, and the service was very friendly. The waiter explained all my questions in detail! Definitely a place to return to. Thank you so much...

Food is pretty solid ‚Äî flavorful and nicely presented, and hits the spot if you‚Äôre craving Mediterranean or Israeli-style dishes.  The classic hummus and beef pide dish were my favorites.  We go the babaganuosh too, and although it was fresh, I felt like it was missing a spice / seasoning to it.   Chicken schnitzel sandwich also good.

On the space - definitely strong Miami vibes and attracts that kind of crowd.   (Makes sense since it‚Äôs from Miami‚Ä¶.)

Would say one downside space wise is that tables are tiny, so it feels a bit cramped especially when you‚Äôre sharing food.

Nice spot overall with good people watching and decent food.
